SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend

Class SavingsPlan

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.SavingsPlan
@Entity public class SavingsPlan extends Object
Represents a savings plan. Each savings plan holds some information about that plan.

  • Constructor Details

    • SavingsPlan

      public SavingsPlan(String goalName, int totalGoalAmount, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Instantiates a new Savings plan.
      Parameters:
      goalName - the goal name.
      totalGoalAmount - the total goal amount.
      startDate - the start date of the savings plan.
      endDate - the end date of the savings plan.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if goalName is null or empty or if startDate is after endDate

    • getTotalSavedPercentage

      public double getTotalSavedPercentage()
      Returns the percentage of the amount saved compared to the goal. The value is between 1 and 0, where e.g. 45% would be 0.45.
      Returns:
      the percentage saved as an int.
